alert.note: Alert for Clark; Delaware; Fairfield; Franklin; Licking; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:42AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FRANKLIN, NORTHWESTERN FAIRFIELD, NORTHERN FAYETTE, PICKAWAY, DELAWARE, SOUTHEASTERN CLARK, WESTERN LICKING AND SOUTHERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 PM EDT... At 1141 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ashley to Lake Darby, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Newark, Dublin, Lancaster, Westerville, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Delaware, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Hilliard, Pickerington, Washington Court House, Worthington, Circleville, Bexley, London, Granville, Jefferson and Pataskala. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 84 and 126. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 63 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Delaware; Fairfield; Franklin; Licking; Madison; Pickaway
